title: DDFP 516: Red Challenge Flag Picks 'Menu' & Broncos: Dead or Alive?
itunes:title: DDFP 516: Red Challenge Flag Picks 'Menu' & Broncos: Dead or Alive?
description:
Shek is joined by Matt Harmon, Cynthia Frelund and Matt "Money" Smith to decide whether or not Tony Romo will take another snap before 2017 and discuss if the Denver Broncos' playoff chances are dead or alive. Also, the fellas and Cynthia review some of the best TV dads of all-time, highlighting Alan Thicke on "Growing Pains." Then, EmmaVP transforms Studio 66 into Indian restaurant, "Shek of India" and the crew reviews an entire menu of appetizers, main courses and desserts describing the biggest Week 15 games in this edition of Red Challenge Flag Picks. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
